short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the cursor in Cloudflared VNC sessions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for everyone struggling with non-visible cursor in Cloudflared browser rendered VNC sessions. (TightVNC, UltraVNC, ...).

It's published here so anyone can use without spending time on making it themselfs.
Anyway, let me know if you find any bugs or errors.
